#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Player.

== Name ==

*[CPlayer Player]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Player (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Type used to record all information about a golfer: Identification, equipment, rounds played,
			statistics.
			A player has a mandatory gender attribute.
			The name and date-of-birth elements are mendatory as the are part of the primary key.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...  
            *gender = [SGender Gender]*
          >  (name, date-of-birth, [CPlayerHandicap current-handicap]?, [CAddress address]`*`, [CContact contact]`*`, [CCountryClubChoice home-country-club]?, [CNote note]?, [CMedia media]?, [CEquipmentList equipment-list]?, [CGolfBag golf-bag]`*`, [CRound round]`*`, [CStatistics statistics]`*`  )</...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CAddress golfml:Address] || [CAddress address] ||  					Address of the player.				 ||
|| [CContact golfml:Contact] || [CContact contact] ||  					Contact information of the player.				 ||
|| [CPlayerHandicap golfml:PlayerHandicap] || [CPlayerHandicap current-handicap] ||  Denormalisation of the current handicap of the player ||
|| xs:date || date-of-birth ||  					Date of birth of player, used to uniquely identify him.				 ||
|| [CEquipmentList golfml:EquipmentList] || [CEquipmentList equipment-list] ||  					List of equipement owned by the player.				 ||
|| [CGolfBag golfml:GolfBag] || [CGolfBag golf-bag] ||  					Collection of at most 14 golf clubs.				 ||
|| [CCountryClubChoice golfml:CountryClubChoice] || [CCountryClubChoice home-country-club] ||  					Main country club of the player.				 ||
|| [CMedia golfml:Media] || [CMedia media] ||  Media associated with the player ||
|| xs:string || name ||  					Name of the player.				 ||
|| [CNote golfml:Note] || [CNote note] ||  					Note associated with the player.				 ||
|| [CRound golfml:Round] || [CRound round] ||  					A round of golf played by the player.				 ||
|| [CStatistics golfml:Statistics] || [CStatistics statistics] ||  					A set of statistical data associated with the player.				 ||      

=== Attributes ===

|| Name || Description || Type || Use || Default || Fixed || Form ||
        
|| gender ||  Gender of the player || [SGender golfml:Gender] || required ||  ||  || unqualified ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[Egolfml golfml]
----
    <xs:complexType name="Player">  <xs:sequence>    <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string">    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="date-of-birth" type="xs:date">    </xs:element>    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="current-handicap" type="golfml:PlayerHandicap">    </xs:element>    <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="address" type="golfml:Address">    </xs:element>    <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="contact" type="golfml:Contact">    </xs:element>    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="home-country-club" type="golfml:CountryClubChoice">    </xs:element>    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="note" type="golfml:Note">    </xs:element>    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="media" type="golfml:Media">    </xs:element>    <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="equipment-list" type="golfml:EquipmentList">    </xs:element>    <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="golf-bag" type="golfml:GolfBag">    </xs:element>    <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="round" type="golfml:Round">    </xs:element>    <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="statistics" type="golfml:Statistics">    </xs:element>  </xs:sequence>  <xs:attribute name="gender" type="golfml:Gender" use="required">  </xs:attribute></xs:complexType>
----
